morningBrief.headline: Overnight Refresh
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 2" means the hardpack got a makeover. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow, Fresh Vibes
morningBrief.body: A proper refresh: 3" of new snow making everything ski better. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.
